metadata.synopsis: Shouts this phrases during the Chicken Chase game.

0.speaker: Devout Mezzka
0.context: NodeContext: Yelled by a goblin taking part in the game - he's chasing a chicken.

1.speaker: Devout Mezzka
1.context: NodeContext: All of these are being yelled by a goblin as they play chicken chase. Think of it as a game of footie, with you roaring as you play.
